description:
`furo-ui5-password-input-labeled`
The furo-ui5-password-input-labeled is a composition to easily use a complete input field with label according
to the design specification of SAP Fiori Design System.
name: FuroUi5PasswordInputLabeled

slots.description: defines the icon to be displayed in the input element.
slots.name: icon

members.name: focus
members.description: Focuses the underlying ui5 input element

members.name: bindData
members.description: Orchestrates the data field connection to the inside

members.name: required
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is required and marked with *.

members.name: disabled
members.description:
A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field cannot be edited by the user and
appears in disabled state.

members.name: readonly
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is readonly.

events.description: Fires the field value when it changes.
events.name: value-changed

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is required and marked with *.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field cannot be edited by the user and
appears in disabled state.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is readonly.
